tool_description:
Find the cheapest french gas station near of your location.
Trouver la pompe à essence la moins cher à côté de votre localisation.
name: Gas Api
title: Gas Api

api_list.name: GetServices
api_list.description: Retrieves the collection of Gas resources.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gas-api3.p.rapidapi.com/api/services"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gas-api3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
